prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The scrapbook was a gift of L. K. Moss, 2004

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Scrapbook compiled by Cadet Clement M. Moss (born 1902, died 1970), Virginia Military Institute Class of 1921, covering the period 1919-1921. Included are snapshots, dance programs, clippings, drawings, and other VMI memorabilia. Topics of the photographs include his classmates and friends, cadet life, athletics, and VMI buildings.
